product_description: Product Description Wells Lamont heavy duty rubber gloves are built to protect your hands from harsh liquids, chemicals, and abrasive materials. Featuring a durable PVC coating, these chemical gloves provide excellent resistance to adhesives, detergents, oils, fertilizers, and diluted acids. The 12-inch gauntlet cuff offers additional protection for your wrists and forearms, while the textured PVC surface delivers a superior grip in wet or slippery conditions. The seamless cotton knit lining ensures comfort and easy on-and-off wear, making these chemical resistant gloves ideal for extended use. Whether you're tackling industrial maintenance, working with concrete, or performing heavy-duty cleaning, these rubber gloves heavy duty are up to the challenge. Wells Lamont — Stubborn About Quality Since 1907. From the Manufacturer Wells Lamont 174L Blue Heavy Duty PVC Supported. Gauntlet Cuff, Large - Heavy weight PVC coated glove. Seamless cotton knit shell. 12-Inch safety length. Very flexible and comfortable. Completely Waterproof and chemical resistant to gasoline, diesel fuels, most farm fertilizers and water based chemicals. See our chemical resistant chart for more specific chemical limitations.

name: Neoprene and Rubber Blend Heavy-Duty Chemical Gloves, Protective industrial gloves for Resist Acid, Alkali, Hazmat, cleaning, dishwashing, Large
short_description: Rubber 50%, Neoprene 30%, Cotton 10%, Other 10%
Imported

Durable and Sensitive: AnTools industrial-strength rubber gloves, featuring a two-toned and double-dipped blend of neoprene and natural rubber, boast a thickness of 28 mil (0.7 mm). They maintain softness while ensuring durability, offering exceptional tactility, sensitivity, and dexterity, flexible enough to handle small objects.

Elevated Comfort: These thick rubber PPE gloves feature a diamond-patterned palm and ergonomic design, ensuring excellent grip for both dry and wet handling. Designed with 100% cotton flock lining, these gloves absorb wearers' sweat, for greater comfort with sustained use, easy to pull on and off, no unpleasant smell left on your hands.

Professional Chemical Resistance: Made from high-quality latex, these industrial rubber gloves offer excellent protection against chemicals. They are suitable for various applications such as utility work, asbestos removal, chemical safety, parts washing, and handling solvents, muriatic acid, and mold. These gloves are reusable.

Testing and Certification: These chemical gloves meet the applicable EN ISO 374-5:2016 standards as Type A gloves, providing protection against reagents A, K, L, N, O, and T, such as muriatic acid, alkali, and solvents. The EN 388:2016 for a performance classsification of 2, 1, 1, 0, X, passed level 2 of abrasion resistance test. Also compliant with CA Prop. 65 Phthalates Regulations.

Specialized Protection: These utility work gloves are ideal for the chemical industry, mold handling, parts washing. Additionally, they serve as heavy-duty kitchen gloves are suitable for both men and women, perfect for dishwashing, cleaning dishes and kitchen appliances, as well as for dishwasher, car washing. We offer these reusable thick rubber gloves in Medium, Large, and Extra Large sizes.
